title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, May 7, 2020
description: "Woman has the right to mount the scaffold; she must equally have the right to mount the rostrum." —Olympe de Gouges (born this day 1748), who died by the guillotine
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: "Woman has the right to mount the scaffold; she must equally have the right to mount the rostrum." —Olympe de Gouges (born this day 1748), who died by the guillotine
